qas.question: In what year did Louis die?
Who did Louis name as his heir?
How old was Sigismund of Luxemburg when he was named heir?
Upon taking the throne of Hungary where did Sigismund establish his court?
What was the result of the Hungarian nobility's refusal to accept Sigismund claim as Louis' heir?
In what year did Louis live?
Who didn't Louis name as his heir?
How old was Sigismund of Luxemburg when he wasn't named heir?
Upon taking the throne of Hungary where didn't Sigismund establish his court?
What was the result of the Hungarian nobility's honor to accept Sigismund claim as Louis' heir?

context: Louis did not leave a son as heir after his death in <a0_0><b5_0>1382<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Instead, he named as his heir the young prince <a1_0><b6_0>Sigismund of Luxemburg<b6_0/><a1_0/>, who was <a2_0><b7_0>11<b7_0/><a2_0/> years old. The Hungarian nobility did not accept his claim, and the result was an <a4_0><b9_0>internal war<b9_0/><a4_0/>. Sigismund eventually achieved total control of Hungary and established his court in <a3_0><b8_0>Buda and Visegrád<b8_0/><a3_0/>. Both palaces were rebuilt and improved, and were considered the richest of the time in Europe. Inheriting the throne of Bohemia and the Holy Roman Empire, Sigismund continued conducting his politics from Hungary, but he was kept busy fighting the Hussites and the Ottoman Empire, which was becoming a menace to Europe in the beginning of the 15th century.
